mapper.select: select Field as value,FieldName as label from WRP_FieldInfo where FormID=#{formid} and FieldID=#{fieldid}
select FormID as value,FormNM as label from SYS_FormInfo where FCode=#{fcode} and FNum=#{fnum} order by FormRank

select CONVERT(varchar(10),dt,120) as DT,isnull(DWQ,0) as DWQ FROM (SELECT dateadd(DD, number, #{begintime}) dt FROM master..spt_values WHERE type = 'p' AND dateadd(DD, number, #{begintime}) <= #{endtime}) a LEFT JOIN (select sum(DWQ) as DWQ,TM from ST_DCanal_C where STCD in(${subsql}) and tm between #{begintime} and #{endtime} group by TM)b on a.dt=b.TM
select CS,count(stcd) as TOTAL,case cs when 1 then '正常' else '故障' end as TITLE from (select stcd,isnull(CS,0) as CS from ST_StationStatus_R) r group by CS order by CS desc
select b.STCD,b.STNM,r.IMAGE from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=7) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join ST_JPG_R r on b.STCD=r.STCD

select b.*,CONVERT(varchar(100),isnull(tm,GETDATE()),120) as TM,isnull(r.Q,0) as Q,isnull(r.Z,0) as Z,case when r.Z>a.Z then 1 when r.Q>a.Q then 1 else 0 end as ALARM from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=4) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_Canal_R1 where tm>=CONVERT(varchar(10),GETDATE(),120)) r on b.STCD=r.STCD left join ST_Canal_Alarm a on b.STCD=a.STCD

select b.*,CONVERT(varchar(100),isnull(r.tm,GETDATE()),120) as TM,r.UPZ,r.DWZ,r.Q,g.OP,case when r.UPZ>a.SZ then 1 when r.DWZ>a.EZ then 1 when r.Q>a.Q then 1 else 0 end as ALARM from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=5) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_WAS_R1 where tm>=CONVERT(varchar(10),GETDATE(),120)) r on b.STCD=r.STCD left join ST_Gate_Alarm a on b.STCD=a.STCD left join ST_Gatage_R g on b.STCD=g.STCD
select b.STCD,b.STNM,r.WWWPath,PUID from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on type=8 and b.STCD=f.STCD left join ST_MOVIE_R r on b.STCD=r.STCD

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(13),a.dt,120) as DT, max(CASE stcd WHEN '6530240001' THEN p ELSE 0 end) RAIN1, max(CASE stcd WHEN '6530240002' THEN p ELSE 0 end) RAIN2, max(CASE stcd WHEN '6530240003' THEN p ELSE 0 end) RAIN3 FROM (SELECT dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) dt FROM master..spt_values WHERE type = 'p' AND dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) <= #{endtime}) a LEFT JOIN (select * from ST_HP_C where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))>=#{begintime} and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) <= #{endtime}) b on a.dt=DATEADD(hh,b.TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), b.DT, 111)) GROUP BY a.dt order by a.dt
select STCD,RZ,W,CONVERT(varchar(20),TM,120) TM from st_rsvr_r where tm >CONVERT(varchar(10),GETDATE(),120) order by tm
select STCD,RZ,W,CONVERT(varchar(20),TM,120) TM from st_rsvr_r where tm >=#{begintime} and TM <=#{endtime} order by tm

select b.STCD,B.STNM,isnull(r.OD,0) as OD,isnull(r.Q,0) as Q,TM from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=6 and b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select STCD,OD,Q,CONVERT(varchar(19), TM, 120) TM from ST_Gatage_R) r on r.STCD=b.STCD

select b.*,CONVERT(varchar(100),isnull(c.tm,#{curdate}),120) as TM,isnull(c.P,0) as P,r.ALARMLEVEL,r.ALARMCONTENT from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=1) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_DP_C where tm=#{curdate}) c on b.stcd=c.stcd left join st_realraindata r on b.stcd=r.stcd

select b.*,CONVERT(varchar(100),isnull(c.tm,GETDATE()),120) as TM,isnull(c.Z,0) as Z,(c.Z-r.AWL) as JL,case when c.Z>r.AWL then 1 else 0 end as ALARM from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=3) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_RIVER_R1) c on b.stcd=c.stcd left join ST_RIVER_Alarm r on b.stcd=r.stcd

select b.*,CONVERT(varchar(100),isnull(c.tm,GETDATE()),120) as TM,isnull(c.RZ,0) as RZ,case when month(GETDATE())>=7 and month(GETDATE())<=9 then c.RZ-FWL79 else c.RZ-FWL end as JL,case when month(GETDATE())>=7 and month(GETDATE())<=9 and c.RZ>FWL79 then 1 when (month(GETDATE())<7 or month(GETDATE())>9) and c.RZ>FWL then 1 else 0 end as ALARM from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=2) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_RSVR_R1) c on b.stcd=c.stcd left join ST_RSV_Alarm r on b.stcd=r.stcd
select STNM,stcd,p,tm from ST_DP_C where tm=convert(char(10), getdate(), 120)
select 0 as INQ,sum(q) as OTQ,0 as IDW,0 as ODW,convert(char(10),getdate(),120) TM from ST_Gatage_R
select STNM,STCD,TM,Q,datediff(minute,tm,convert(char(10),getdate(),120)+' 00:00:00') as SIGN from ST_Gatage_R where STCD='6530240018'

select top 1 Q,CONVERT(varchar(13),tm,120) as TM,ROW_NUMBER()over(order by tm desc) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm < convert(char(10),getdate(),120)+' 00:00:00' and stcd=#{stcd}

select sum(AQ*(case when INTERVAL is null then ENDVAL when INTERVAL>ENDVAL then ENDVAL else INTERVAL end)) as SUMQ,sum(case when INTERVAL is null then ENDVAL when INTERVAL>ENDVAL then ENDVAL else INTERVAL end) as SUMVAL,CONVERT(varchar(13),ATM,120) as TM,(select Q from ST_Gatage_H where TM=max(ATM)) as LASTQ,CONVERT(varchar(20),min(ATM),120) as BEGINVAL from (select datediff(second,a.TM,convert(datetime,CONVERT(varchar(13), a.TM, 120)+':59:59',20)) as ENDVAL,datediff(second,a.TM,b.TM) as INTERVAL,a.TM as ATM,b.TM as BTM,a.Q as AQ,b.Q as BQ from (select Q,TM,id,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by TM) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm>=convert(char(10),getdate(),120)+' 00:00:00' and tm <=convert(char(10),getdate(),120)+' 23:59:59' and STCD=#{stcd}) a full join (select Q,TM,id,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by TM) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm>=convert(char(10),getdate(),120)+' 00:00:00' and tm <=convert(char(10),getdate(),120)+' 23:59:59' and STCD=#{stcd}) b on a.RowId=b.RowId-1 where a.TM is not null) as s group by CONVERT(varchar(13),ATM,120)

select b.*,isnull(r.A_Q,0) as Q,isnull(r.A_Z,0) as Z,isnull(WQ,0) as WQ,DT,TM from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B where stcd in('6530240004','6530240005','6530240019')) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=4) f on b.STCD=f.STCD inner join (select * from ST_HCanal_C where stcd in('6530240004','6530240005','6530240019') and DT=convert(char(10),getdate(),120)) r on b.STCD=r.STCD
select DT,TM,RZ from ST_RIVER_H where DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate(),120)

select b.HW-a.Hw as HW,b.DT,b.TM from (select * from st_rsvr_h where DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate(),120) or (DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate()-1,120) and tm=23)) a full join (select * from st_rsvr_h where DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate(),120) or (DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate()-1,120) and tm=23)) b on a.id=b.id-1 where a.HW is not null and b.HW is not null

select b.*,c.Z,CONVERT(varchar(100),c.TM,120) as TM,isnull(r.MAXZ,c.Z)-c.Z as DOWNZ,c.Z-isnull(r.MINZ,c.Z) as UPZ from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=3) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_RIVER_R1) c on b.stcd=c.stcd left join (select STCD,max(Z) as MAXZ,min(Z) as MINZ from ST_RIVER_R where TM between dateadd(hour,-2,GETDATE()) and GETDATE() group by STCD) r on b.stcd=r.stcd

select b.*,c.RZ,CONVERT(varchar(100),c.TM,120) as TM,isnull(r.MAXRZ,c.RZ)-c.RZ as DOWNRZ,c.RZ-isnull(r.MINRZ,c.RZ) as UPRZ from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=2) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_RSVR_R1) c on b.stcd=c.stcd left join (select STCD,max(RZ) as MAXRZ,min(RZ) as MINRZ from ST_RSVR_R where TM between dateadd(hour,-2,GETDATE()) and GETDATE() group by STCD) r on b.stcd=r.stcd
select top 1 RZ,W,TM from st_rsvr_r where tm < convert(char(13),getdate(),120)+':00:00' order by tm desc

select b.STCD,B.STNM,isnull(c.OD,0) as OD,isnull(c.Q,0) as Q,TM from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=6 and b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select L.STCD,L.OD,L.Q,CONVERT(varchar(19), L.TM, 120) as TM from ST_Gatage_H as L inner join (select STCD,max(TM) as TM from ST_Gatage_H R where od>0.00 and TM < convert(char(13),getdate(),120)+':00:00' group by STCD) R on L.STCD=R.STCD and L.TM=R.TM) c on c.STCD=b.STCD

select b.STCD,b.STNM,isnull(c.P,0) as P from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=1) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_HP_C where DT=convert(char(10),getdate(),120) and TM=CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-1) c on b.stcd=c.stcd

select b.*,isnull(r.A_Q,0) as Q,isnull(r.A_Z,0) as Z,isnull(WQ,0) as WQ,DT,TM from (select STCD,STNM from ST_STBPRP_B where stcd in('6530240004','6530240005','6530240019','6530240020')) b inner join (select * from ST_STBPRP_F where type=4) f on b.STCD=f.STCD left join (select * from ST_HCanal_C where stcd in('6530240004','6530240005','6530240019','6530240020') and DT=convert(char(10),getdate(),120) and TM=CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-1) r on b.STCD=r.STCD
select STNM,STCD,RZ,DT,TM from ST_RIVER_H where DT=convert(char(10),getdate(),120) and TM=CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-1

select b.HW-a.Hw as HW,b.DT,b.TM from (select * from st_rsvr_h where DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate(),120) and TM between CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-2 and CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-1) a full join (select * from st_rsvr_h where DT=CONVERT(varchar(10),getdate(),120) and TM between CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-2 and CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(varchar(2),getdate(), 108))-1) b on a.id=b.id-1 where a.HW is not null and b.HW is not null
select STNM,STCD,TM,isnull(Q,0) as Q,datediff(minute,tm,convert(char(13),DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()),120)+':00:00') as SIGN from ST_Gatage_R where stcd='6530240018'

select sum(AQ*(case when INTERVAL is null then ENDVAL when INTERVAL>ENDVAL then ENDVAL else INTERVAL end)) as SUMQ,sum(case when INTERVAL is null then ENDVAL when INTERVAL>ENDVAL then ENDVAL else INTERVAL end) as SUMVAL,CONVERT(varchar(13),ATM,120) as TM,(select Q from ST_Gatage_H where TM=max(ATM)) as LASTQ from (select datediff(second,a.TM,convert(datetime,CONVERT(varchar(13), a.TM, 120)+':59:59',20)) as ENDVAL,datediff(second,a.TM,b.TM) as INTERVAL,a.TM as ATM,b.TM as BTM,a.Q as AQ,b.Q as BQ from (select isnull(Q,0) as Q,TM,id,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by TM) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm>=convert(char(13),DATEADD(HOUR, -2, GETDATE()),120)+':00:00' and tm <=convert(char(13),DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()),120)+':59:59' and STCD=#{stcd}) a full join (select isnull(Q,0) as Q,TM,id,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by TM) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm>=convert(char(13),DATEADD(HOUR, -2, GETDATE()),120)+':00:00' and tm <=convert(char(13),DATEADD(HOUR, -1, GETDATE()),120)+':59:59' and STCD=#{stcd}) b on a.RowId=b.RowId-1 where a.TM is not null) as s group by CONVERT(varchar(13),ATM,120)
select top 1 isnull(Q,0) as Q,TM,id,1 as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm < convert(char(13),DATEADD(HOUR, -2, GETDATE()),120)+':00:00' and STCD=#{stcd} order by tm desc

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(13),a.dt,120) AS DT, b.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by a.dt desc) AS RowId FROM ( SELECT dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) dt FROM master..spt_values WHERE type = 'p' AND dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) <=#{endtime} ) a LEFT JOIN ( select DATEADD(hh,m.TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), m.DT, 111)) as TEMP,isnull(m.HW-s.HW,0) as HW,case when m.CV>0 then '↑' when m.CV <0 then '↓' else '-' end as CV,m.INQ,m.OTQ,cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),m.RZ) as varchar) as RZ,cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),m.HW) as varchar) as KR from (select ID,DT,TM,RZ,INQ,OTQ,HW,CV FROM ST_RSVR_H where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))>=#{addtion1} and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) <=#{addtion2}) s full join (select ID,DT,TM,RZ,INQ,OTQ,HW,CV FROM ST_RSVR_H where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))>=#{begintime} and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) <=#{endtime}) m on s.id=m.id-1 where m.DT is not null) b ON a.dt = b.TEMP

select top 1 DT,TM,cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),RZ) as varchar) as RZ,INQ,OTQ,0.00 as HW,case when CV>0 then '↑' when CV <0 then '↓' else '-' end as CV,cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),HW) as varchar) as KR from ST_RSVR_H where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))<#{begintime} order by ID desc

select b.STNM,b.STCD,'4-6月：'+cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),a.FWL) as varchar)+' 7-9月：'+cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),a.FWL79) as varchar) as FWL,cast(Convert(decimal(10,2),a.ZCWL) as varchar) as ZCWL from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=2 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join ST_RSVR_R1 r on r.stcd=b.stcd left join ST_RSV_Alarm a on b.STCD=a.STCD

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(13),a.dt,120) AS DT, b.Q,b.WQ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by a.dt desc) AS RowId FROM ( SELECT dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) dt FROM master..spt_values WHERE type = 'p' AND dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) <= #{endtime} ) a LEFT JOIN ( select sum(A_Q) as Q,sum(WQ) as WQ,DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) as DT from ST_HCanal_C where stcd in('6530240004','6530240005','6530240019') and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))>=#{begintime} and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))<=#{endtime} group by DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) ) as b on a.dt=b.DT
select STNM,STCD,TM,Q,datediff(minute,tm,#{begintime}) as SIGN from ST_Gatage_R where STCD='6530240018'
select top 1 Q,CONVERT(varchar(13),tm,120) as TM,ROW_NUMBER()over(order by tm desc) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm <= #{begintime} and stcd='6530240018'

select sum(AQ*(case when INTERVAL is null then ENDVAL when INTERVAL>ENDVAL then ENDVAL else INTERVAL end)) as SUMQ,sum(case when INTERVAL is null then ENDVAL when INTERVAL>ENDVAL then ENDVAL else INTERVAL end) as SUMVAL,CONVERT(varchar(13),ATM,120) as TM,(select Q from ST_Gatage_H where TM=max(ATM)) as LASTQ,CONVERT(varchar(20),min(ATM),120) as BEGINVAL from (select datediff(second,a.TM,convert(datetime,CONVERT(varchar(13), a.TM, 120)+':59:59',20)) as ENDVAL,datediff(second,a.TM,b.TM) as INTERVAL,a.TM as ATM,b.TM as BTM,a.Q as AQ,b.Q as BQ from (select Q,TM,id,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by TM) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm>=#{begintime} and tm <=#{endtime} and STCD='6530240018') a full join (select Q,TM,id,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by TM) as RowId from ST_Gatage_H where q is not null and od>0.00 and tm>=#{begintime} and tm <=#{endtime} and STCD='6530240018') b on a.RowId=b.RowId-1 where a.TM is not null) as s group by CONVERT(varchar(13),ATM,120) order by TM

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(13),a.dt,120) AS DT, b.RZ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by a.dt desc) AS RowId FROM ( SELECT dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) dt FROM master..spt_values WHERE type = 'p' AND dateadd(HH, number, #{begintime}) <= #{endtime} ) a LEFT JOIN ( select DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) as DT,RZ from ST_RIVER_H where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))>=#{begintime} and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))<=#{endtime} ) as b on a.dt=b.DT

select distinct Canal_Code,Canal_Name,Upper_Canal_Code from WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem where Canal_Code in(select Upper_Canal_Code from WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem where Canal_Code in(select distinct BaseID from ST_STINFO_WRP WHERE FormID = 'WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and STCD in (select stcd from ST_STBPRP_F f where f.type = 4))) union select Canal_Code,Canal_Name,Upper_Canal_Code from WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem where Canal_Code in(select distinct BaseID from ST_STINFO_WRP WHERE FormID = 'WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and STCD in (select stcd from ST_STBPRP_F f where f.type = 4)) union select 'Vother' as Canal_Code,'其他' as Canal_Name, '-1' as Upper_Canal_Code

select b.STCD,b.STNM from ST_STBPRP_B b INNER JOIN ST_STBPRP_F f ON f.type = 4 AND b.stcd = f.stcd LEFT JOIN ST_Canal_R1 r ON r.stcd = b.stcd
where STYPE=#{sitetype}

select b.STCD,b.STNM from ST_STBPRP_B b INNER JOIN ST_STBPRP_F f ON f.type = 4 AND b.stcd = f.stcd LEFT JOIN ST_Canal_R1 r ON r.stcd = b.stcd where b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP w where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (w.BaseID=#{meCode} or w.BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild('${meCode}'))))
and STYPE=#{sitetype}

select b.STCD,b.STNM from ST_STBPRP_B b INNER JOIN ST_STBPRP_F f ON f.type = 4 AND b.stcd = f.stcd LEFT JOIN ST_Canal_R1 r ON r.stcd = b.stcd where b.STCD not in( SELECT stcd FROM ST_STINFO_WRP w WHERE FormID = 'WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem')
and STYPE=#{sitetype}
